item.title: Light Years
item.description: Light Years (GitHub) A space-shooter action game/game engine built with C++ and SFML.â€‹ Building the Project Clone the repository to your local machine. Navigate to the root directory of the project. Create a new directory named build. Open Command Prompt (CMD) and change the directory to the newly created build folder. In CMD, type the following command to build the project: cmake -S .. -B . Once the build is successful, you will find the vs solution in the build directory.
